dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4415217F] Prohibited material posted on a website using your hosting
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: The below-pasted webpage is currently not accessible as of 10:48:42 a.m. (GMT-6) on June 6, 2007. Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, June 05, 2007 10:52 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4415217F] Prohibited material posted on a website using your hosting services ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Prohibited material posted on a website using your hosting services Added by system at Tuesday, Jun 5 2007 01:44 pm X-MailFrom: seneca.carroll@achdirect.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Jun 5 13:43:58 2007 Received: (qmail 21086 invoked by alias); 5 Jun 2007 18:43:56 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 21083 invoked from network); 5 Jun 2007 18:43:56 -0000 Received: from spooling.theplanet.com (69.56.141.4) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 5 Jun 2007 18:43:56 -0000 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 05 Jun 2007 13:43:58 -0500 Received: from [172.16.220.10] (helo=DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) by spooling.theplanet.com (envelope-from seneca.carroll@achdirect.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Hve0b-0006o0-5R for abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net; Tue, 05 Jun 2007 13:43:57 -0500 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 5 Jun 2007 13:42:53 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 5 Jun 2007 13:42:53 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from seneca.carroll@achdirect.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HvdzY-00047x-UB for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 05 Jun 2007 13:42:52 -0500 Received: from txmail.achdirect.com ([12.5.82.101]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from seneca.carroll@achdirect.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HvdzM-000Goe-B4 for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 05 Jun 2007 13:42:40 -0500 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.0.6603.0 content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C7A7A1.7E31A7C0" Subject: Prohibited material posted on a website using your hosting services Date: Tue, 5 Jun 2007 13:44:05 -0500 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Prohibited material posted on a website using your hosting services Thread-Index: AcenoX4HOyGU1hPUTxK5dQkrguaxbA== X-Priority: 1 Priority: Urgent Importance: high From: "Seneca Carroll" To: Cc: "Kristin Gilda" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 05 Jun 2007 18:42:53.0244 (UTC) FILETIME=[534C6FC0:01C7A7A1] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) To whom it may concern: I am contacting you as an attorney for ACH Direct, Inc. A website using your hosting services, is posting an article that infringes on ACH Direct's trademark in relation to one of its products. The Article, located http://www.uploadx.com/articles/ecommerce/Dont_Neglect_The_Humble_Check. html and entitled "Don't Neglect (Ignore) the Humble Check" includes a misuse of our trademark ATMVerify(r) (USPTO serial number 76523001) as well as incorrect information about the product. We have already attempted to contact the owner of the website, requesting they remove the article in question. However, the website has not complied with our request to date. I am writing to ask you to contact the website owner to demand compliance with our request to remove the article from their website. If the owner refuses, or you are unable to reach him/her, you should disable the webpage for trademark infringement. I hope I can count on your cooperation in this and future matters. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter. Kristin T. Gilda General Counsel ACH Direct, Inc. 500 W. Bethany Drive, Suite 200 Allen, TX 75013 469-675-9920 ext. 718 kristin.gilda@achdirect.com www.achdirect.com www.paymentsgateway.com This e-mail and any files transmitted with it may contain PRIVILEGED or CONFIDENTIAL information and may be read or used by the intended recipient. If you are not the intended recipient of the e-mail or any of its attachments, please be advised that you have received this e-mail in error and that any use, dissemination, distribution, forwarding, printing, or copying of this e-mail or any attached files is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in error, please immediately purge it and all attachments and notify the sender by reply e-mail or contact the sender at the number listed. MIME element (text/html) Prohibited material posted on a website using your hosting services

To whom it may concern:

I am contacting you as an attorney for ACH Direct, Inc.

A website using your hosting services, is posting an article that infringes on ACH Direct’s trademark in relation to one of its products.  The Article, located http://www.uploadx.com/articles/ecommerce/Dont_Neglect_The_ Humble_Check.html and entitled “Don’t Neglect (Ignore) the Humble Check” includes a misuse of our trademark ATMVerify! ® (USPTO serial number 76523001) as well as incorrect information about the product.  We have already attempted to contact the owner of the website, requesting they remove the article in question. However, the website has not complied with our request to date.  I am writing to ask you to contact the website owner to demand compliance with our request to remove the article from their website.  If the owner refuses, or you are unable to reach him/her, you should disable the webpage for trademark infringement.  I hope I can count on your cooperation in this and future matters.

Please let me know if you have any questions.  Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter.

Kristin T. Gilda

General Counsel

ACH Direct, Inc.

500 W. Bethany Drive, Suite 200

Allen, TX 75013

469-675-9920 ext. 718

kristin.gilda@achdirect.com

www.achdirect.com

www.paymentsgateway.com

 

This e-mail and any files transmitted with it may contain PRIVILEGED or CONFIDENTIAL information and may be read or used by the intended recipient. If you are not the intended recipient of the e-mail or any of its attachments, please be advised that you have received this e-mail in error and that any use, dissemination, distribution, forwarding, printing, or copying of this e-mail or any attached files is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in error, please immediately purge it and all attachments and notify the sender by reply e-mail or contact the sender at the number listed.

MIME element (text/plain)
